          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">Egy kihúzott fog</string>
            <string language="en-US">Pulled out tooth</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausgezogener Zahn</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dent retirée</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dente retirado</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dente estratto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξαγμένο δόντι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Diente sacado</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">Egy kihúzott fog fényképe, ahol a fog felépítése is megfigyelhető</string>
            <string language="en-US">Picture of a pulled out tooth, the structure of the tooth is observable</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">A fog felépítése</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">Kép egy fogról</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">fog</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abbildung eines ausgezogenen Zahnes, die Struktur
des Zahnes ist wahrnehmbar</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'image d'une dent retirée, la structure de la 
dent est observable</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O retrato do puxado para fora do dente, a 
estrutura do dente é observable</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'immagine di un dente estratto, la struttura del 
dente è osservabile</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η εικόνα ενός εξαγμένου δοντιού, η δομή του δοντιού 
είναι αισθητή</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El cuadro de un diente sacado, la estructura del 
diente es observable</string>
          </description>
